description: Proposal:  Change of use of the ground floor and basement from financial and professional services (Class A2) to restaurant (Class A3).
decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the end of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

Condition : 2 - The development shall not be occupied until such time as the details of the ducting to be fitted to the building have been submitted to and approved in writing by the Council and installed in accordance with the details thus approved. The ducting shall thereafter be maintained in effective order to the reasonable satisfaction of the Council.

Reason: To safeguard the appearance of the premises and the character of the immediate area in accordance with the requirements of policy CS14 of the London Borough of Camden Local Development Framework Core Strategy and policies DP24 and DP25 of the London Borough of Camden Local Development Framework Development Policies.
Condition : 3 - Prior to the commencement of development the details of the changes to the front elevation shall be submitted to and approved by the Council. Such details shall include sections, elevations and plans of the proposed shopfront and lightwell. The relevant part of the works shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved.

Reason: To safeguard the appearance of the premises and the character of the immediate area in accordance with the requirements of policy CS14 of the London Borough of Camden Local Development Framework Core Strategy and policies DP24 and DP25 of the London Borough of Camden Local Development Framework Development Policies.
Condition : 4 - The use hereby permitted shall not be carried out outside the following times: 10:00 to 00:30 Mondays to Saturdays and 12:00 to 00:00 Sundays and Bank holidays. 

Reason: To safeguard the amenities of the adjoining premises and the area generally in accordance with the requirements of policies CS5 and CS7 of the London Borough of Camden Local Development Framework Core Strategy and policy DP26 and DP12 of the London Borough of Camden Local Development Framework Development Policies.
Condition : 5 - Noise levels at a point 1 metre external to sensitive facades shall be at least 5dB(A) less than the existing background measurement (LA90), expressed in dB(A) when all plant/equipment (or any part of it) is in operation unless the plant/equipment hereby permitted will have a noise that has a distinguishable, discrete continuous note (whine, hiss, screech, hum) and/or if there are distinct impulses (bangs, clicks, clatters, thumps), then the noise levels from that piece of plant/equipment at any sensitive faï¿½ade shall be at least 10dB(A) below the LA90, expressed in dB(A).

Reason: To safeguard the amenities of the adjoining generally in accordance with the requirements of policy CS5 of the London Borough of Camden Local Development Framework Core Strategy and policies DP26 and DP28 of the London Borough of Camden Local Development Framework Development Policies.
Condition : 6 - Before the use commences, the extract ventilating system shall be provided with acoustic isolation and sound attenuation measures in accordance with the recommendations contained in the acoustic report and silencer specifications details approved by the Council. The acoustic isolation shall thereafter be maintained in effective order to the reasonable satisfaction of the Council.

Reason: To safeguard the amenities of the adjoining premises and the area generally in accordance with the requirements of policy CS5 of the London Borough of Camden Local Development Framework Core Strategy and policies DP26 and DP28 of the London Borough of Camden Local Development Framework Development Policies.
Condition : 7 - No sound emanating from the use shall be audible within any adjoining premises between 2300 hrs and 0700 hrs.

Reason: To safeguard the amenities of the adjoining premises and the area generally in accordance with the requirements of policies CS5 and CS7 of the London Borough of Camden Local Development Framework Core Strategy and policies DP26, DP28 and DP12 of the London Borough of Camden Local Development Framework Development Policies.
Condition : 8 - Automatic time clocks shall be fitted to the equipment/machinery hereby approved, prior to commencement of the use of the units, to ensure that the plant/equipment does not operate between [00:30hrs] and [10:00hrs]. The timer equipment shall be properly maintained and retained permanently thereafter.

Reason:- To safeguard the amenities of the adjoining premises and the area generally in accordance with the requirements of policies CS5 and CS7 of the London Borough of Camden Local Development Framework Core Strategy and policies DP26, DP28 and DP12 of the London Borough of Camden Local Development Framework Development Policies.
Condition : 9 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans: Site plan; W01; W02; W03; W04A; W05; Acoustic Report ref 10120-004 dated June 2010 by Philips Acoustics; Silencer specification details dated 9/9/10 by Philip Acoustics; Letter specifying extraction equipment from Brian Taylor (HK Extraction Ltd) dated 6 May 2010; 

Reason:
For the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
Condition : 10 - The extract/ventilation equipment hereby approved is only as specifically identified in the approved Acoustic report and Silencer details. No other specification of equipment shall be installed without the approval of the Council.

Reason:- To safeguard the amenities of the adjoining premises and the area generally in accordance with the requirements of policies CS5 and CS7 of the London Borough of Camden Local Development Framework Core Strategy and policies DP26, DP28 and DP12 of the London Borough of Camden Local Development Framework Development Policies.
